me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.scoreboard

Class ScoreboardInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.scoreboard.ScoreboardInformation

  • public final class ScoreboardInformation
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents information about a soon-to-be-created scoreboard. This type is intended for returning information that will be used to create a dynamically cycling scoreboard. No length limits exist.

        public ScoreboardInformation(java.lang.String title,
                     ScoreboardEntry... entries)
        Creates a scoreboard information instance.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the scoreboard.
        entries - The entries to include in the scoreboard, in order from top to bottom as they should appear.

    • Method Detail

      • setCyclerLength

        public void setCyclerLength(int len)
        Sets the length to which the title cycler will trim text.

        Due to restrictions of Minecraft, this value must be a natural number less than or equal to 32.

        Parameters:
        len - The new length of the cycler
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the cycler has already been initialized.

      • getTitle

        public TextCycler getTitle()
        Gets the single cycler reference held by this class which will cycle through the title.
        Returns:
        A TextCycler that cycles through the scoreboard title.

      • getEntries

        public java.util.List<ScoreboardEntry> getEntries()
        Gets an unmodifiable collection of existing scoreboard entries. This collection is guaranteed to iterate in the order (from top to bottom) that the entries should appear in to the player.
        Returns:
        An unmodifiable collection of scoreboard entries.
